div.h2: Chester Community Charter School (CCCS) is dedicated to empowering students as learners through the development of a results-driven academic environment, which includes a partnership with parents, a focus on building life skills, and a commitment to cultivating children’s instinctive quest for knowledge.

a.strong: We’ve got a lot going on! Check out our latest news

img.alt:
ATTENTION CCCS FAMILIES: You can register for a Chromebook up until Wednesday, April 22. Also, families with three or more scholars can now register for an additional Chromebook to meet your needs.
For more information, and/or to register for a Chromebook, please call our hotline at 484-482-1941. Thank you!

ATTENTION CCCS FAMILIES: You can register for a Chromebook up until Wednesday, April 22. Also, families with three or more scholars can now register for an additional Chromebook to meet your needs.
For more information, and/or to register for a Chromebook, please call our hotline at 484-482-1941. Thank you!
If you're not sure how to access remote learning tools for your scholar, look no further! 👍 Here's how to get to the CCCS Distance Learning Information Site.
If you're not sure how to access remote learning tools for your scholar, look no further! 👍 Here's how to get to the CCCS Distance Learning Information Site.

Due to tomorrow's inclement weather, all Chromebook pickups scheduled for tomorrow (4/13) will now take place on Friday (4/17). All appointments scheduled for Monday will be at the same time of day, only on Friday. If you cannot make your new pickup day, please call 484-482-1941 to reschedule. Call center hours are Monday through Friday, 7:45 am to 4:45 pm.
All appointments have a guaranteed Chromebook designated to them. This will not affect the availability of Chromebooks.

Due to tomorrow's inclement weather, all Chromebook pickups scheduled for tomorrow (4/13) will now take place on Friday (4/17). All appointments scheduled for Monday will be at the same time of day, only on Friday. If you cannot make your new pickup day, please call 484-482-1941 to reschedule. Call center hours are Monday through Friday, 7:45 am to 4:45 pm.
All appointments have a guaranteed Chromebook designated to them. This will not affect the availability of Chromebooks.

CCCS will soon be loaning Chromebooks to students who do not have access to computers at home for remote learning. To register for a Chromebook, you must take this quick survey: https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/CCCS_HOME_TECH. The survey will direct you to a page with more registration details, based on what your family needs. (Chromebooks must be returned to CCCS when school resumes. Limit one per household.)

CCCS will soon be loaning Chromebooks to students who do not have access to computers at home for remote learning. To register for a Chromebook, you must take this quick survey: https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/CCCS_HOME_TECH. The survey will direct you to a page with more registration details, based on what your family needs. (Chromebooks must be returned to CCCS when school resumes. Limit one per household.)

Looking for learning resources for your scholar while they're home? Follow these steps to access them!
https://chestercommunitycharter.org/student-resources

Looking for learning resources for your scholar while they're home? Follow these steps to access them!
https://chestercommunitycharter.org/student-resources

IMPORTANT UPDATE: CCCS will remain closed until further notice, in compliance with an order from Gov. Wolf. Please continue checking chestercommunitycharter.org for updates and more info, as well as our Facebook and Instagram pages for breaking news.
Read more about the Governor's order here: https://www.governor.pa.gov/newsroom/gov-wolf-and-sec-of-health-expand-stay-at-home-order-to-carbon-cumberland-dauphin-and-schuylkill-counties-extend-school-closures-indefinitely/
